issue.title: [C++] Clean up commenting on execution plan example
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15976](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15976). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The commenting on this example file has gotten a little out of sync with our normal commenting style.  This is just a quick ticket to clean it up.

comments.body:
